calculateNewCost(int, String) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.Market
A method that calculates cost of market selling and buying prices.
calculateScore() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.Player
Calculates the score of the player based on the resources that they own.
changeCustomName(String) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.College
Setter for the custom name.
changeEnergyCount(int) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.Tile
Setter for the ore count of the tile.
changeOreCount(int) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.Tile
Setter for the ore count of the tile.
checkGameEnd() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.GameEngine
Returns a value that's true if all tiles have been claimed, and false otherwise
claimTile() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.GameEngine
Claims the last tile to have been selected on the main GameScreen for the active player This grants them the ability to plant a Roboticon on it and yield resources from it for themselves Specifically registers the selected tile under the object holding the active player's data, re-colours its border for owner identification purposes and moves the game on to the next player/phase
claimTileButton - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.GameScreen
Button which allows players to claim selected tiles
cleanUp() - Static method in class TesterFile
 
closeUpgradeOverlay() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.GameScreen
Closes the upgrade overlay and restores the functionality of the game's main stage
closeUpgradeOverlayButton - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.GameScreen
Button allowing players to escape from the upgrade overlay if they decide against upgrading roboticons
College - Class in com.mygdx.game
 
College(int, String) - Constructor for class com.mygdx.game.College
The constructor for the College class This will assign a name and a logo to the College based on the ID provided
College - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.Player
The college that the player is playing as.
CollegeFont - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.CollegeScreen
Font used to render text directly to the screen's stage See the TTFont class for more information about how this works
CollegeScreen - Class in com.mygdx.game
 
CollegeScreen(Game) - Constructor for class com.mygdx.game.CollegeScreen
The college-selection screen's initial constructor
com.mygdx.game - package com.mygdx.game
 
com.mygdx.game.desktop - package com.mygdx.game.desktop
 
complete - Variable in class GameTimerTest
 
constructButtons() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.GameScreen
Sets up the buttons to be placed onto the interface later by defining their visual representations and their on-click functions together
constructButtons() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.Market
Instantiates the purchase/sale buttons to be placed in the market and sets their on-click functions Obviously, these buttons enable players to buy and sell resources during certain game-phases
constructCentreTable() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.CollegeScreen
Builds and deploys the central table containing a list of the colleges that players can choose to play for Currently sets up a header and a sequence of buttons to select individual colleges This is very bare-bones right now and definitely due to change in time
constructInterface() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.Market
Builds the market's visual interface by populating it with labels and buttons Once this method has finished executing, the market can be drawn to a stage like any other actor
constructLeftTable() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.GameScreen
Set up the form and contents of the left-hand table so that they can be rendered later Specifically defines the left-hand panel's spatial framework (in the form of a table) before populating it with the game's timer, a phase label, a button for ending turns, the logo of the current player's associated college and counters visualising the numbers of ore, energy, food and Roboticon stocks (and the money) that the current player holds
constructP1Table() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.CollegeScreen
Builds and deploys the table which comprises the interface for P1 to select and customise their college of choice
constructP2Table() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.CollegeScreen
Builds and deploys the table which comprises the interface for P2 to select and customise their college of choice Currently nothing more than visual guff (IE: headers and stuff)
constructPauseMenu() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.GameScreen
Set up the pause menu to allow for the game to be successfully paused
constructRightTable() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.GameScreen
Set up the form and contents of the right-hand table so that they can be rendered later Specifically defines the right-hand panel's spatial framework (in the form of a table) before populating it with the selected tile's name-label and college/roboticon icons, along with buttons to claim and deploy/upgrade Roboticons on the selected tile and the whole interface for the game's market
constructTileGrid() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.GameScreen
Set up the game-screen's central tile-grid so that it can be interacted with The tiles on this grid take the form of invisible buttons that are directly laid over the map image at the centre of this screen
constructUpgradeOverlay() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.GameScreen
Set up an overlay which shows up when the current player opts to upgrade their roboticon This will allow them to upgrade its food, energy or ore production stats
create() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.Main
Automatically set the game-state to load the splash-screen as soon as the game window opens
currentPlayer() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.GameEngine
Returns the data pertaining to the player who is active at the time when this is called
currentPlayerIcon - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.GameScreen
Icon representing the currently-active player's chosen college
currentPlayerIcon() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.GameScreen
Returns the icon object used to visualise the logo of the current player's associated college The GameEngine class uses this method to update said logo when it changes the active player
currentPlayerID - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.GameEngine
Holds the numeric getID of the player who's currently active in the game
currentPlayerID() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.GameEngine
Returns the ID of the player who is active at the time when this is called
CurrentTile - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.Roboticon
Variable holding what tile the roboticon is stored on.
CustomName - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.College
The custom name that a player can choose for the college.
